8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "None of you should fast on Friday unless he fasts before it, or he fasts after it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ صَوْمِ يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ وَحْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Fast On Friday Alone
